data.text: E Babilonɨn Faner mɨriabar apiaghav ikiava,
Gumazir e isa kalabus garɨghiziba ghaze,
E manmagh suvɨra kantrin igharazimɨn ikɨ,
O Jerusalemɨn Nguibam, kɨ nɨ gɨn amadagh,
O Jerusalem, kɨ nɨ isa faraghavɨra uan dɨghorim gamigha nɨ bagha bar akonge.
O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ dughiar gumaziba Jerusalem gasɨghasɨzi, Idomia e gamizir arazim gɨnɨghnɨgh.
Gumazir kam nɨn borir iririviba inigh,
